Title: A Worthy Challenge: Yan-zhu the Uncasked
Description:
$n, I need you to assemble a hearty group and lead them into Stormstout Brewery. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and evaporate Yan-zhu the Uncasked.

Return to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Stormstout Brewery Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Stormstout Brewery Challenge Mode
